mainBoard.flavorText: Even as he came swooping down, Gwaihir saw the two figures fall, worn out, hiding their eyes from death.
mainBoard.name: Eagle of Deliverance
mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Eagle of Deliverance enters, put an indestructible counter on another target creature you control. Draw a card if that creature's power is 2 or less.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The Rohirrim have long been the friends of the people of Gondor, though they are not akin to them."
—Aragorn

foreignData.flavorText:
„Die Rohirrim sind schon seit langem Freunde des Volkes von Gondor, auch wenn sie grundverschieden sind."
—Aragorn
foreignData.name: Reiter der Ostmark
foreignData.text:
Wachsamkeit
Immer wenn der Reiter der Ostmark einem Goblin oder Ork Schaden zufügt, zerstöre jene Kreatur.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Los rohirrim son amigos de las gentes de Gondor desde hace mucho tiempo, aunque no compartan parentesco alguno".
—Aragorn
foreignData.name: Caballero de la Marca del Este
foreignData.text:
Vigilancia.
Siempre que el Caballero de la Marca del Este haga daño a un Trasgo u Orco, destruye esa criatura.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Les Rohirrim sont depuis longtemps amis du peuple du Gondor, même s'ils n'en sont pas parents. »
—Aragorn
foreignData.name: Cavalier de la Marche Orientale
foreignData.text:
Vigilance
À chaque fois que le Cavalier de la Marche Orientale inflige des blessures à un gobelin ou un orque, détruisez cette créature.

foreignData.flavorText:
"I Rohirrim sono da tempo amici del popolo di Gondor, nonostante le loro differenze."
—Aragorn
foreignData.name: Cavaliere del Mark dell'Est
foreignData.text:
Cautela
Ogniqualvolta il Cavaliere del Mark dell'Est infligge danno a un Goblin o a un Orco, distruggi quella creatura.

foreignData.flavorText:
「血こそ分けていないが、ロヒアリムは永きに渡りゴンドールの民の友であった。」
——アラゴルン
foreignData.name: 東マーク軍団の騎兵
foreignData.text:
警戒
東マーク軍団の騎兵がゴブリンやオークのうち１体にダメージを与えるたび、そのクリーチャーを破壊する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士

foreignData.flavorText:
"Os Rohirrim há muito são amigos do povo de Gondor, mesmo sem nenhum parentesco."
— Aragorn
foreignData.name: Cavaleiro da Marca Oriental
foreignData.text:
Vigilância
Toda vez que Cavaleiro da Marca Oriental causar dano a um Goblin ou um Orc, destrua aquela criatura.

foreignData.flavorText:
「洛希尔人长久以来都是刚铎人民的朋友；不过他们之间并非同族。」
～阿拉贡
foreignData.name: 东马克骑兵
foreignData.text:
警戒
每当东马克骑兵对任一鬼怪或半兽人造成伤害时，消灭后者。

mainBoard.name: East-Mark Cavalier
mainBoard.originalText:
Vigilance
Whenever East-Mark Cavalier deals damage to a Goblin or Orc, destroy that creature.
mainBoard.text:
Vigilance
Whenever East-Mark Cavalier deals damage to a Goblin or Orc, destroy that creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: The Tooks came, a hundred strong, from Tuckborough and the Green Hills.

foreignData.flavorText: Eine Hundertschaft der Tuks kam aus Tuckbergen und von den Grünbergen.
foreignData.name: Mäherin der Tuks
foreignData.text: Wenn die Mäherin der Tuks stirbt, führt der Ring dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText: Los Tuk llegaron, un centenar, desde Alforzada y las Colinas Verdes.
foreignData.name: Segadora Tuk
foreignData.text: Cuando la Segadora Tuk muera, el Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText: Les Touque vinrent, forts d'une centaine d'entre eux, depuis Bourg-de-Touque et les Collines vertes.
foreignData.name: Faucheuse Touque
foreignData.text: Quand la Faucheuse Touque meurt, l'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText: I Tuc giunsero in gran numero, almeno un centinaio, da Tucboro e dalle Verdi Colline.
foreignData.name: Falciatrice Tuc
foreignData.text: Quando la Falciatrice Tuc muore, l'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText: 遥々、タックボロー村から緑丘に至るまで、百を超えるトゥック一族が集まった。
foreignData.name: トゥック家の収穫人
foreignData.text: トゥック家の収穫人が死亡したとき、指輪があなたを誘惑する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ハーフリング・農民

foreignData.flavorText: Os Tûks vieram, com uma centena, de Tuqueburgo e das Colinas Verdes.
foreignData.name: Ceifeira Tûk
foreignData.text: Quando Ceifeira Tûk morre, o Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText: 图克家的人来了，足有一百个，都是从塔克领和绿丘陵赶来的。
foreignData.name: 图克家收割人
foreignData.text: 当图克家收割人死去时，魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Took Reaper
mainBoard.originalText: When Took Reaper dies, the Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: When Took Reaper dies, the Ring tempts you.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Gondor is in great need. Lord Denethor asks for all your strength and all your speed, lest Gondor fall at last."

foreignData.flavorText: „Gondor ist in großer Not. Fürst Denethor ersucht euch um all eure Stärke und Eile, damit Gondor nicht fällt."
foreignData.name: Berittener Bote aus Gondor
foreignData.text: Wenn der Berittene Bote aus Gondor ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte. Falls du dann keine legendäre Kreatur kontrollierst, lege eine Karte aus deiner Hand unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText: "Un gran peligro amenaza Gondor. El señor Denethor precisa de vuestra fuerza y diligencia para impedir que caiga el reino".
foreignData.name: Mensajero de Gondor
foreignData.text: Cuando el Mensajero de Gondor entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta. Luego, si no controlas una criatura legendaria, pon una carta de tu mano en el fondo de tu biblioteca.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le Gondor a grand besoin d'aide. Le seigneur Denethor demande toute votre force et toute votre célérité, de crainte que le Gondor ne finisse par tomber. »
foreignData.name: Messager du Gondor
foreignData.text: Quand le Messager du Gondor arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez une carte. Puis, si vous ne contrôlez pas de créature légendaire, mettez une carte de votre main au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.flavorText: "Gondor ha bisogno di aiuto. Sire Denethor richiede tutta la vostra forza e la vostra rapidità, altrimenti Gondor cadrà."
foreignData.name: Messaggero di Gondor
foreignData.text: Quando il Messaggero di Gondor entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca una carta. Poi, se non controlli una creatura leggendaria, metti una carta dalla tua mano in fondo al tuo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「ゴンドールには助けが必要です。ゴンドールが落ちてしまわぬよう、デネソール侯は皆様の持つ全ての力を可能な限り早く所望しておられます。」
foreignData.name: ゴンドールの使者
foreignData.text: ゴンドールの使者が戦場に出たとき、カード１枚を引く。その後、あなたが伝説のクリーチャーをコントロールしていないなら、あなたの手札にあるカード１枚をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "Gondor está em grandes apuros. O Senhor Denethor pede toda a sua força e presteza, ou Gondor finalmente cairá."
foreignData.name: Estafeta de Gondor
foreignData.text: Quando Estafeta de Gondor entrar no campo de batalha, compre um card. Em seguida, se você não controlar uma criatura lendária, coloque um card de sua mão no fundo de seu grimório.

foreignData.flavorText: 「刚铎如今情势危急。德内梭尔城主请您倾力相助，尽速出兵，否则刚铎必将陷落。」
foreignData.name: 刚铎信使
foreignData.text: 当刚铎信使进战场时，抓一张牌。然后若你未操控传奇生物，则将一张牌从你手上置于你的牌库底。

mainBoard.name: Errand-Rider of Gondor
mainBoard.originalText: When Errand-Rider of Gondor enters the battlefield, draw a card. Then if you don't control a legendary creature, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
mainBoard.text: When Errand-Rider of Gondor enters, draw a card. Then if you don't control a legendary creature, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

mainBoard.flavorText: How had it come to be on his finger? He wondered if the Ring itself had not played him a trick.

foreignData.flavorText: Wie war er an seinen Finger gelangt? Er fragte sich, ob der Ring selbst ihm wohl einen Streich gespielt hatte.
foreignData.name: Den Ring anstecken
foreignData.text: Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt, ins Exil und bringe sie dann unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel zurück. Der Ring führt dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText: ¿Cómo le había llegado al dedo? Se preguntó si el Anillo le había jugado una mala pasada.
foreignData.name: Ponerse el Anillo
foreignData.text: Exilia la criatura objetivo de la cual eres propietario, luego regrésala al campo de batalla bajo tu control. El Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText: Comment était-il arrivé à son doigt ? Il se demanda si l'Anneau lui-même ne lui avait pas joué un tour à sa façon.
foreignData.name: Enfiler l'Anneau
foreignData.text: Exilez une créature ciblée que vous possédez, puis renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle. L'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText: Com'era finito al suo dito? Si chiese se l'Anello stesso non gli avesse giocato un brutto scherzo.
foreignData.name: Indossare l'Anello
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura bersaglio che possiedi, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo. L'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText: どうやって指輪が指に嵌ったのだろう？まるで指輪が意図したかのようだった。
foreignData.name: 指輪嵌め
foreignData.text: あなたがオーナーであるクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを追放し、その後、あなたのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。指輪があなたを誘惑する。

foreignData.flavorText: Como é que ele tinha ido parar no dedo dele? Ele se perguntou se o próprio Anel não lhe havia pregado uma peça.
foreignData.name: Colocar o Anel
foreignData.text: Exile a criatura alvo que você possui e depois a devolva ao campo de batalha sob seu controle. O Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText: 这是怎么戴到他手指上去的？他在想是不是戒指本身就在作弄他。
foreignData.name: 误戴魔戒
foreignData.text: 放逐目标由你拥有的生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Slip On the Ring
mainBoard.originalText: Exile target creature you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control. The Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Once the exiled creature returns, it's considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creatures will be put into their owners' graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creatures will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creatures will cease to exist.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.
You can target a creature you own but don't control with Slip On the Ring.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control. The Ring tempts you.

mainBoard.flavorText: Wormtongue bared his teeth; and then with a hissing breath he spat before the king's feet.

foreignData.flavorText: Schlangenzunge fletschte die Zähne und spuckte dann mit einem zischenden Atemzug vor die Füße des Königs.
foreignData.name: Verbannung aus Edoras
foreignData.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken {2} weniger, falls er eine getappte Kreatur als Ziel hat.
Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: Lengua de Serpiente enseñó los dientes y, con un sonido sibilante, escupió a los pies del rey.
foreignData.name: Expulsar de Edoras
foreignData.text:
Te cuesta {2} menos lanzar este hechizo si hace objetivo a una criatura girada.
Exilia la criatura objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Langue de Serpent montra les dents, puis dans un sifflement, il cracha aux pieds du roi.
foreignData.name: Bannir d'Edoras
foreignData.text:
Ce sort coûte {2} de moins à lancer s'il cible une créature engagée.
Exilez une créature ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: Vermilinguo digrignò i denti, poi con un sibilo sputò ai piedi del re.
foreignData.name: Bandire da Edoras
foreignData.text:
Questa magia costa {2} in meno per essere lanciata se bersaglia una creatura TAPpata.
Esilia una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 蛇の舌は歯を食いしばり、鋭い息とともに唾を王の足元へ吐き捨てた。
foreignData.name: エドラスからの追放
foreignData.text:
この呪文がタップ状態のクリーチャーを対象とするなら、この呪文を唱えるためのコストは{2}少なくなる。
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: Língua de Cobra mostrou os dentes; e, com um sibilo, cuspiu aos pés do rei.
foreignData.name: Banir de Edoras
foreignData.text:
Esta mágica custa {2} a menos para ser conjurada se tiver como alvo uma criatura virada.
Exile a criatura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: 佞舌龇牙咧嘴，随即嗤的一声往国王跟前吐了口痰。
foreignData.name: 逐出埃多拉斯
foreignData.text:
如果此咒语以已横置的生物为目标，则它减少{2}来施放。
放逐目标生物。

mainBoard.name: Banish from Edoras
mainBoard.originalText:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a tapped creature.
Exile target creature.
mainBoard.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a tapped creature.
Exile target creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: "You've hurt my master, you brute, and you'll pay for it."

foreignData.flavorText: „Du hast meinem Herren wehgetan, du Rohling, und dafür wirst du zahlen."
foreignData.name: Samweis der Beherzte
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen
Wenn Samweis der Beherzte ins Spiel kommt, bestimme bis zu eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl in deinem Friedhof, die in diesem Zug aus dem Spiel dorthin gelegt wurde. Bringe sie auf deine Hand zurück. Dann führt der Ring dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText: "Heriste a mi amo, bestia, y me las pagarás".
foreignData.name: Samsagaz el intrépido
foreignData.text:
Destello.
Cuando Samsagaz el intrépido entre al campo de batalla, elige hasta una carta de permanente objetivo en tu cementerio que haya ido allí desde el campo de batalla este turno. Regrésala a tu mano. Luego, el Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vous avez fait du mal à mon maître, brute, et vous allez le payer. »
foreignData.name: Samsagace l'Intrépide
foreignData.text:
Flash
Quand Samsagace l'Intrépide arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez jusqu'à une carte de permanent ciblée dans votre cimetière qui y a été mise ce tour-ci depuis le champ de bataille. Renvoyez-la dans votre main. Puis l'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText: "Hai ferito il mio signore, bruto! Pagherai per questo."
foreignData.name: Samwise dal Cuore Intrepido
foreignData.text:
Lampo
Quando Samwise dal Cuore Intrepido entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli fino a una carta permanente bersaglio nel tuo cimitero che vi è stata messa dal campo di battaglia in questo turno. Riprendila in mano. Poi l'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「よくも旦那をやったな。ただじゃおかねえ。」
foreignData.name: 剛毅なるサムワイズ
foreignData.text:
瞬速
剛毅なるサムワイズが戦場に出たとき、このターンに戦場からあなたの墓地に置かれてそこにあるパーマネント・カード最大１枚を対象とする。それをあなたの手札に戻す。その後、指輪があなたを誘惑する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ハーフリング・農民

foreignData.flavorText: "Você machucou meu mestre, sua brutamontes, e você vai pagar por isso."
foreignData.name: Samwise, o Destemido
foreignData.text:
Lampejo
Quando Samwise, o Destemido, entrar no campo de batalha, escolha até um card de permanente alvo em seu cemitério que tenha sido colocado lá vindo do campo de batalha neste turno. Devolva aquele card para sua mão. Depois, o Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你伤了我家少爷，你这畜生，你要为此付出代价！」
foreignData.name: 勇敢的山姆怀斯
foreignData.text:
闪现
当勇敢的山姆怀斯进战场时，选择至多一张目标在你坟墓场中的永久物牌，且须为于本回合中从战场进入该处者。将该牌移回你手上。然后魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Samwise the Stouthearted
mainBoard.originalText:
Flash
When Samwise the Stouthearted enters the battlefield, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. Then the Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text:
Flash
When Samwise the Stouthearted enters, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. Then the Ring tempts you.

mainBoard.flavorText: "A chance for Faramir, Captain of Gondor, to show his quality."

foreignData.flavorText: „Eine Gelegenheit für Faramir, Heermeister Gondors, seinen Wert unter Beweis zu stellen."
foreignData.name: Feldmarschall Faramir
foreignData.text:
Zu Beginn deines Endsegments und falls in diesem Zug eine Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle gestorben ist, ziehe eine Karte.
Immer wenn der Ring dich in Versuchung führt und falls du eine andere Kreatur als Feldmarschall Faramir als deinen Ringträger bestimmt hast, erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Mensch-Soldat-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.flavorText: "Es una buena oportunidad para que Faramir, capitán de Gondor, muestre su nobleza".
foreignData.name: Faramir, comandante de campo
foreignData.text:
Al comienzo de tu paso final, si una criatura murió bajo tu control este turno, roba una carta.
Siempre que el Anillo te tiente, si eliges una criatura que no sea Faramir, comandante de campo como tu portador del Anillo, crea una ficha de criatura Soldado Humano blanca 1/1.

foreignData.flavorText: « Une chance pour Faramir, capitaine du Gondor, de prouver sa qualité. »
foreignData.name: Faramir, commandant de terrain
foreignData.text:
Au début de votre étape de fin, si une créature est morte sous votre contrôle ce tour-ci, piochez une carte.
À chaque fois que l'Anneau vous tente, si vous avez choisi une créature autre que Faramir, commandant de terrain comme porteur de l'Anneau, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Humain et Soldat.

foreignData.flavorText: "Un'occasione per Faramir, Capitano di Gondor, di mostrare il suo valore."
foreignData.name: Faramir, Comandante di Campo
foreignData.text:
All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se è morta una creatura sotto il tuo controllo in questo turno, pesca una carta.
Ogniqualvolta l'Anello ti tenta, se hai scelto una creatura diversa da Faramir, Comandante di Campo come tuo Portatore dell'Anello, crea una pedina creatura Soldato Umano 1/1 bianca.

foreignData.flavorText: 「ゴンドールの大将、ファラミアがその真価を見せる時が来た。」
foreignData.name: 野戦指揮官、ファラミア
foreignData.text:
あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、このターンにクリーチャーがあなたのコントロール下で死亡していた場合、カード１枚を引く。
指輪があなたを誘惑するたび、あなたが野戦指揮官、ファラミアでないクリーチャーをあなたの指輪所持者に選んだ場合、白の１/１の人間・兵士・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "Uma chance para Faramir, Capitão de Gondor, mostrar sua qualidade."
foreignData.name: Faramir, Comandante de Campo
foreignData.text:
No início de sua etapa final, se uma criatura tiver morrido sob seu controle neste turno, compre um card.
Toda vez que o Anel tentar você, se você escolheu uma criatura que não seja Faramir, Comandante de Campo, como seu Guardião do Anel, crie uma ficha de criatura Humano Soldado branca 1/1.

foreignData.flavorText: 「让刚铎统帅法拉米尔证明品格的机会。」
foreignData.name: 战场指挥法拉米尔
foreignData.text:
在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物在你的操控下死去，则抓一张牌。
每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择战场指挥法拉米尔以外的生物作你的持戒人，则派出一个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。

mainBoard.name: Faramir, Field Commander
mainBoard.originalText:
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, draw a card.
Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than Faramir, Field Commander as your Ring-bearer, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

rulings.text: Faramir, Field Commander doesn't need to have been on the battlefield when the creature died. For example, if a creature dies during combat on your turn and you cast Faramir, Field Commander during your second main phase, its first ability will trigger at the beginning of your end step.

Faramir, Field Commander's first ability will trigger only once during your end step, no matter how many creatures died under your control this turn. However, if no creatures have died under your control so far this turn as your end step begins, the ability won't trigger at all. It's not possible to cause a creature to die under your control during the end step in time to have the ability trigger.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

mainBoard.text:
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, draw a card.
Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than Faramir, Field Commander as your Ring-bearer, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

mainBoard.flavorText: He passed over Udûn and Gorgoroth and saw all the land in ruin and tumult beneath him, and before him Mount Doom blazing, pouring out its fire.

foreignData.flavorText: Er flog über Udûn und Gorgoroth und sah, dass das Land unter ihm verwüstet und in Aufruhr war. Vor ihm loderte der Schicksalsberg und ergoss sein Feuer über das Tal.
foreignData.name: Landroval, Zeuge des Horizonts
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn zwei oder mehr Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, einen Spieler angreifen, erhält eine angreifende nichtfliegende Kreatur deiner Wahl Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Sobrevoló Udûn y Gorgoroth y vio toda la tierra destruida y en ruinas, y ante él se alzaba el Monte del Destino, que humeaba y escupía fuego.
foreignData.name: Landroval, testigo del horizonte
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que dos o más criaturas que controlas ataquen a un jugador, la criatura atacante objetivo sin la habilidad de volar gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Il survola Udûn et Gorgoroth, et vit la terre en ruine et le tumulte en dessous de lui, et devant lui la Montagne du Destin embrasée, déversant son feu.
foreignData.name: Landroval, témoin de l'horizon
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois qu'au moins deux créatures que vous contrôlez attaquent un joueur, une créature attaquante sans le vol ciblée acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Sorvolando Udûn e Gorgoroth, sotto di lui giacevano terre in rovina e tumulto, mentre davanti a lui ardevano le fiamme del Monte Fato.
foreignData.name: Landroval, Testimone dell'Orizzonte
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta due o più creature che controlli attaccano un giocatore, una creatura attaccante bersaglio senza volare guadagna volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: ウドゥンとゴルゴロスを越え、荒れ果てた地と動乱を見下ろした先、目前に滅びの山が火を吹きそびえ立っていた。
foreignData.name: 地平線に臨むもの、ランドローヴァル
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたがコントロールしている２体以上のクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人を攻撃するたび、飛行を持たない攻撃クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは飛行を得る。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 鳥・貴族

foreignData.flavorText: Ele sobrevoou Udûn e Gorgoroth e viu abaixo a terra arruinada e em tumulto, e à frente o Monte da Perdição ardia, cuspindo seu fogo.
foreignData.name: Landroval, Testemunha do Horizonte
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que duas ou mais criaturas que você controla atacam um jogador, a criatura atacante sem voar alvo ganha voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 他飞越乌顿和戈埚洛斯，看见身下大地分崩离析，轰鸣作响，而眼前末日山烈焰翻腾，倾泻热火。
foreignData.name: 彼方见证蓝德洛瓦
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当由你操控的两个或更多生物攻击一位牌手时，目标进行攻击且不具飞行异能的生物获得飞行直到回合结束。

mainBoard.name: Landroval, Horizon Witness
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever two or more creatures you control attack a player, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: In a multiplayer game, Landroval, Horizon Witness's triggered ability triggers once for each player you attack with at least two creatures.

Two or more creatures you control must attack the same player in order for Landroval, Horizon Witness's ability to trigger. Creatures you control that attack planeswalkers that player controls or battles that player is protecting won't count toward Landroval, Horizon Witness's trigger condition.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever two or more creatures you control attack a player, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: As Faramir and Éowyn stood so, their hands met and clasped, though they did not know it.

foreignData.flavorText: Als Faramir und Éowyn dort standen, fanden sich ihre Hände und umfassten einander, ohne dass sie es merkten.
foreignData.name: Galgenfrist
foreignData.text:
Bringe einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Mientras Faramir y Éowyn esperaban, sus manos se encontraron y se juntaron, aunque ellos no se percataron.
foreignData.name: Aplazar
foreignData.text:
Regresa el hechizo objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Alors que Faramir et Éowyn se tenaient là, leurs mains se joignirent et se serrèrent, même s'ils ne s'en rendirent pas compte.
foreignData.name: Éclaircie
foreignData.text:
Renvoyez un sort ciblé dans la main de son propriétaire.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Le mani di Faramir ed Éowyn si avvicinarono, intrecciandosi, senza accorgersene.
foreignData.name: Sollievo
foreignData.text:
Fai tornare una magia bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 共に立ち並ぶファラミアとエオウィンは、自らも気付かぬうちに手を取り合っていた。
foreignData.name: 一時の猶予
foreignData.text:
呪文１つを対象とする。それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText: Enquanto Faramir e Éowyn assim estavam, suas mãos se encontraram e se deram, ainda que os dois não tenham percebido.
foreignData.name: Aliviamento
foreignData.text:
Devolva a mágica alvo para a mão de seu dono.
Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: 于法拉米尔和伊奥温静静伫立时，他们双手交叠，彼此紧握，但两人却全然不知。
foreignData.name: 稍作缓息
foreignData.text:
将目标咒语移回其拥有者手上。
抓一张牌。

mainBoard.name: Reprieve
mainBoard.originalText:
Return target spell to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: If a spell is returned to its owner's hand, it's removed from the stack and thus will not resolve. The spell isn't countered; it just no longer exists. This works against a spell that can't be countered.

mainBoard.text:
Return target spell to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

mainBoard.name: Inherited Envelope
mainBoard.originalText:
When Inherited Envelope enters the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text:
When Inherited Envelope enters, the Ring tempts you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
